== Elackad (628130) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Elackad is a village in the [[Meenachil]] taluka of [[Kottayam]] district with an area of 2311 hectares and harbouring 3249 households with total population of 13333 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Palai]] is at a distance of 11 km. Male population is 6587 and female population is 6746. Scheduled Caste Population is 1420 and Scheduled Tribes population is 48. Census Location Code of the village is 628130<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 12009 (90.07%)
* Literate male population: 5970 (90.63%)
* Literate female population: 6039 (89.52%)
